fields.label: Author
fields.name: author
fields.description:
Author metadata.
              The name of the document's author.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description:
Description metadata.
              A short and accurate summary of the content of the page.
              Several browsers, like Firefox and Opera, use this as the default description of bookmarked pages.

fields.label: Open Graph Metadata
fields.name: og
fields.description: Metadata used by the OpenGraph protocol. See https://ogp.me/

fields.label: Type
fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of your object, e.g., "video.movie". Depending on the type you specify, other properties may also be required.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The text to show for a link. If it is a supported icon, the icon will be shown instead.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
